bibl.title: New Reconstructions and Identifications of New Testament Papyri
bibl.note: 1. Reassigning Some Manuscripts to the Same Codex: P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. 1120 + P. Barc. Inv. 1 + P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 403; 336 (1); 336 (2)); P. Oxy. VII, 1008 + 1009 (= van Haelst 505; 524); P. Yale I, 2 + P.S.I. XIV, 1373 (= van Haelst 522; 526); P. Oxy. XXXIV, 2683 (= van Haelst 372) + P. Oxy. LXIV, 4405 + 4403 (?). - 2. New Identifications: P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. 1120 (= van Haelst 403); P. Oxy. IV, 657 and P.S.I. XII, 1292 (= van Haelst 537); P. Oxy. XIII, 1598 (= van Haelst 528); P. Baden IV, 57 (= van Haelst 492); P. Chester Beatty II Suppl. (= van Haelst 497); P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426): A Reconstruction of the Manuscript's Production; P. Bodmer II: Newly Identified Fragments.
bibl.seg: COMFORT Philip W., New Reconstructions and Identifications of New Testament Papyri.

1. Reassigning Some Manuscripts to the Same Codex: P. Paris Bibl. Nat. Suppl. Gr. 1120 + P. Barc. Inv. 1 + P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex 18) (= van Haelst 403; 336 (1); 336 (2)); P. Oxy.
